lead_paragraph: WEINER--Walter H. Consummate lawyer, banker and philanthropist. Founding member of Kronish Lieb Weiner & Hellman and former Chairman and CEO of Republic National Bank. Our partner, our client and our dear friend. We mourn his passing and extend our condolences to his dear wife Nina, his sons Tom and Jon, and his family. Cooley LLP 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  WEINER, WALTER H
